| HistoryText             = The Yamaguchi-gumi were a Yakuza syndicate which attempted to seize control of the [[Shogun Warriors (Earth-616)|Shogun Warriors]]. They infiltrated one of their men into the [[Followers of the Light (Earth-616)|Followers of the Light]]'s Sanctuary base and commandeered the Rayden  robot. Which was used to fight the other two robots, while Yakuza soldiers attacked the [[Sanctuary of Light]]. Their scheme failed and upon being captured, they were brainwashed to forget everything they knew about the Followers of the Light.{{r|Shogun Warriors Vol 1 15}} 

Years later, their oyabun [[Shinji Kizaki (Earth-616)|Shinji Kizaki]] was the most powerful and influential crimelord in the Far East. [[Maximillian Zaran (Earth-616)|Zaran]] who was seeking employment with him, was put to the test on an island against [[James Howlett (Earth-616)|Wolverine]]. Zaran was defeated and Wolverine left the island, but not before disrespecting Shinji Kizaki. Who vowed to avenge himself on Wolverine one day.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 158}}
